content: Investments Unit Trust Asked by AnonymousAsked on 25 Apr 2019Does unit trusts give dividend?2 answersAnswerBump0

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 25 Apr 2019Some do. Can be on a monthly basis even. Have to read the prospectus to see if the dividend is taken out of the NAV or not though0 comments0

Ang Yee Gary, Medicine at National University Of SingaporeLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 25 Apr 2019It depends on which unit trust.
It accumulates all the dividends and pay a distribution but the net asset value will fall by the same amount.0 comments0
